summary: Young Englishman inherits ranch which he wants to sell, but Gene's gonna turn him into a real westerner instead..
cast: Gene Autry|Smiley Burnette|Judith Allen|Ronald Sinclair|Guy Usher|Bill Elliott|John Ward|Frankie Marvin|Chris-Pin Martin|Stanley Blystone|Bud Osborne|Alba Arene|Billy Arnold|Lynton Brent|Roy Bucko|Cecilia Callejo|Champion|James Conaty|Ken Cooper|Joe De La Cruz|Jerry Frank|John Harron|Merrill McCormick|Nelson McDowell|Bob Reeves|Al Taylor|Duke Taylor|Max Terhune
title: Boots and Saddles
